entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone Ginny might go out with and has a past connection to Cedric's death.

entities.name: cedric

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is the one speaking about her feelings towards Harry and is afraid of being thrown off the Ravenclaw Quidditch team.

relationships.description: Harry was with Cedric when he died.
Ginny might go out with Harry and has feelings towards him.
